MyCareer Unlocker

Use this unlocker to get access to MyCarrer mode. First use an .EXE from 1. folder, create a new MyCareer build. Then quit the game, change the .EXE to the one from the 2. folder and load that existing save. Later you can stay with 2nd .EXE. Credits: original Cheat Table creator(s) and my anonymous friend, who patched game EXEs according to those tables.

  • https://www107.zippyshare.com/v/W5eN81SI/file.html
  • http://sendfile.su/1575637
  • https://pixeldrain.com/u/4GcXiB7P

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on clean Steam release: 93.9 GB
  • CODEX crack/emu applied over
  • YES, YOU CAN PLAY MyCareer MODE WITH UNLOCKER POSTED ABOVE!
  • Please note, that while all bonuses of Mamba Forever Edition are activated in the crack’s ini, absolute majority of those features can’t be used w/o legit online access, so this repack can’t be called MFE
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Spanish and Chinese commentaries
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 93.9 to 49.7~55.3 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~50 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~1 hour 20 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 94 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

NBA 2K21 is the latest title in the world-renowned, best-selling NBA 2K series, delivering an industry-leading sports video game experience.

With extensive improvements upon its best-in-class graphics and gameplay, competitive and community online features, and deep, varied game modes, NBA 2K21 offers one-of-a-kind immersion into all facets of NBA basketball and culture – where Everything is Game.
